resources.string:
How to play:
1. Create lutemons in the home view
2. Train and level up your lutemons
3. Fight all kinds of enemies on the battlefield
4. Advance up to battlefield level 5 to beat the final boss!
 
Tips:
When you move lutemons to home they are healed
If a lutemon goes to 0 hp, they will lose their progress
The lutemon with the most health will always be the one attacking
